meta.name: description
meta.content: Timpanogos Academy is a FREE Charter school in Lindon, UT. We are nationally ranked in the top 8% of schools. Truly, we create a love of learning and a school culture second to none.
Timpanogos Academy | Free Charter School | Utah
We are a Nationally-ranked, free Charter School in Lindon, Utah. We are an academically rigorous school based on the Core Knowledge Curriculum.
